#summary Sets which methods to run after an action is executed.
#labels method,controller,init

The methods corresponding to the names you pass in will be executed after the action on the controller is executed. You can pass in one or many method names in a list. By default the methods will be executed after all actions in the controller but you can control this by using the only and exclude arguments.

|| *Name* || *Required* || *Type* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| filters || yes || list || || list of method names ||
|| only || no || list || "" || limit the filter method to be run only after certain actions ||
|| exclude || no || list || "" || limit the filter method to be run after all actions except some ||

*Examples:*

{{{
  <cfset afterFilter(filters="translate", only="termsOfUse")>
}}}
